channel.title: minishift on Everyday Linux
channel.description: Recent content in minishift on Everyday Linux

item.title: MiniShift Tips
item.description: MiniShift Tips hard cleanup minishift environment For example, for errors such as domain 'minishift' already exists with uuid Check if the VM is still running $ sudo virsh list --all If it is running, stop the minishift VM $ sudo virsh destroy minishift Delete the VM $ sudo virsh undefine minishift Delete the .minishift/machines dir
